title: Mobile Troubleshooting - Cannot Send MMS
description: A customer can send SMS texts but cannot send or receive MMS (picture messages).

tasks.description: Verify the customer's device model and that their plan supports MMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has a compatible device and plan.

tasks.description: Check the APN (Access Point Name) settings on the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the APN settings are outdated for the customer's device type.

tasks.description: Send an SMS with the correct APN configuration settings to the customer's device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the tool to push the correct settings to the device.
